segments.source_content:
---
title: Overview
description: The React Native Community
---

React Native is a widely used technology, empowered by a massive community of [hundreds of thousands of developers](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/stargazers) and downloaded [over 2 million times](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native) every week.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 是一項被廣泛使用的技術，由[數十萬開發者](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/stargazers)組成的龐大社群所支持，每週下載量[超過200萬次](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native)。

segments.source_content: In this section you will find listed ways you can also be part of the React Native-related communities, depending on your wants and needs:

translations.zh-hant: 在本節中，您可以根據自身需求找到參與 React Native 相關社群的方式：

segments.source_content:
- [Staying up to date](staying-updated)
- [Participating in the community](communities)
- [Needing and providing help](support)

translations.zh-hant:
- [保持最新資訊](staying-updated)
- [參與社群活動](communities)
- [尋求與提供協助](support)

segments.source_content: We expect all folks participating in React Native' communities to adhere to the guidelines within our [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).

translations.zh-hant: 我們期望所有參與 React Native 社群的成員都能遵守我們的[行為準則](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)。
